summary: Completed testing of BIST 100 stock analysis platform updates. Backend successfully expanded stock list from 100 to 444 symbols including TGSAS and DESPC. New partial match endpoint implemented. Frontend tabs structure in place but session management issues prevented full UI testing.

flaky_endpoints.workaround: Endpoint exists and is functional, but may need performance optimization

integration_issues.issue: Session expires during navigation, redirecting back to login

passed_tests: Backend API health check and authentication
Stock symbols list expanded to 444 symbols (from 100)
TGSAS stock present in symbol list
DESPC stock present in symbol list
Analysis page structure in place (based on code review)
Tam Kalıp and Devam Eden Kalıp tabs implemented in code
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider optimizing the partial match endpoint performance to reduce timeout issues. Session management could be improved for better user experience during navigation.

success_percentage.backend: 90% (Key features working, partial match endpoint has timeout issues)
success_percentage.frontend: 75% (Login and dashboard working, analysis page navigation issues)
